website_summaries.verdict: The overall response towards the Skechers GOrun 600 Refine has been mostly positive. People emphasize this product’s highly accommodating build, the appealing looks, the comfortable midsole, and the wallet-friendly price. On the other hand, the initial break-in period and the lack of perceivable arch support has been lamented by some testers.Fans of road running shoes are the target market of the GOrun 600 Refine.
pros: Several consumers have expressed their appreciation of the Skechers GOrun 600 Refine’s stylish design
The materials that are used for this running shoe are deemed durable enough to last for many miles
Some testers feel that the upper unit is able to ventilate the foot for extended running sessions
The lightweight structure of this product is praised by those who welcome footwear that doesn’t weigh them down
‘Comfortable’ is a word that many testers have used to describe their time wearing this Skechers running shoe
The cushioning system is appreciated for being responsive and flexible enough to handle all types of activities
The price is considered affordable by runners and casual shoe enthusiasts who didn’t want a hefty price tag on their foot-apparel
cons: Several purchasers claim that the Skechers GOrun 600 Refine demands a break-in period before being entirely comfortable
A few people lament the lack of arch support, stating that the midfoot area isn’t accommodating of those whose feet get tired quickly

customer_reviews.title: Superb...wish I’d tried them sooner
customer_reviews.text: Best Skechers I’ve had...always had memory foam soles until now but the Go Max soles in these are much springier and way more comfortable. Will buy Go Runs from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Watson

customer_reviews.title: wrong size
customer_reviews.text: size 8 was ordered.box said 8 but the shoes inside were size 8.5.they were needed for a special event so there was no time to return them and double thick socks had to be worn. shoes looked good but not a great buy as they will only get limited use.
customer_reviews.author: oldguy

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: These are really comfortable just like wearing slippers, they have plenty of foot room ideal if you're feet have spread out. I can't fault them yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Top notch service, great product and would use them again in a heartbeat
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, light and comfortable not a running shoe but a decent walking shoe
customer_reviews.author: paul sparks

customer_reviews.title: Cushion of air
customer_reviews.text: I got these because of problems with my feet and my wife said go for these. I am glad I did. They fit as expected and they have a good cushion inside. Any problems? I have to say no.
customer_reviews.author: a person of good taste

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pair of comfy shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are way more better than the other skechers shoes I've had and no need to fit any insoles to make them 2x as comfy. I'm using these more than my other brand of shoes :) one happy customer!!
customer_reviews.author: nick unwin

customer_reviews.title: Trainers
customer_reviews.text: they fit a lot better than other products I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit and smart for a trainer .
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking trainer I have been told that they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: maryclare macneil

customer_reviews.title: These was very comfortable but as of today the sole is coming off
customer_reviews.text: These was very comfortable but as of today the sole is coming off, these only get used on Gym days, I have other Sketchers with no problems that's why I went for these but the build quality on these are dreadful for the sole to start coming off after about 6 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: SatDish

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes at a good price!
customer_reviews.text: Just like all Sketchers, excellent fit, comfortable and smart. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: humanbean

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and good quality shoe for running. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: 'Best thing you could invest in'
customer_reviews.text: Real real comfortable run to walk in lively fit for my wild feet
customer_reviews.author: Fred Nobles

customer_reviews.title: Great light comfortable trainer
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable, light trainer at a great price, better than a lot of others on the market, would recommend
customer_reviews.author: KJ

product_meta.title: Skechers Men's 55061 Fitness Shoes
product_meta.description: These Go Run 600 - Refine men's trainers from Skechers feature responsive 5Gen cushioning midsole and a breathable mesh upper. Skechers Go Run 600 - Refine shoes are well-cushioned, lightweight trainers ideal for a variety of workouts in and out of the gym. These trainers feature breathable sandwich mesh fabric and synthetic upper along with well ventilated upper design. The sole is designed for responsive traction and ground feel.
